sentences.sContent: They are all perforated by openings of their own, but few line up, meaning passersby are faced with an assortment of opaque surfaces.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are all perforated by openings of their own, but few line up, meaning passersby are faced with an assortment of opaque surfaces.
sentences.sCn: 它们都是由自己的洞口穿孔，很少排列起来，意味着路人面对着各式各样的不透明表面。

words.tran: 组合的；各种各样的；混杂的
把…分等级；把…归为一类（assort的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a mixture of different things or of various kinds of the same thing
